articles.title: San Franciscans split about a second Outside Lands weekend | The City - San Francisco Examiner
articles.description: Residents have mixed feelings about proposal to create a second weekend next year.
articles.content:
As San Francisco recovers from Outside Lands this week, its unclear if The City is ready for twice the fun next year.
But that could become the reality if a plan moves ahead to extend the annual eve… [+4558 chars]
